commit message: first commit
Initial import from local Subversion.

updated README and added devnotes.txt
added line wraps
line wrap

Added SensorElement class and launch lane blocker.

The SensorElement class is an invisible sensor that notifies the field's delegate when a ball is within its area. This is used to implement a barrier that prevents the ball from going back down the launch lane after it's entered the field. Also added several delegate m ethods for custom actions when a game starts or ends or a ball is lost.

Eliminated most object allocations in the game loop.

Changed List and Set objects to plain arrays where possible, replaced foreach over ArrayLists with explicit counted loops to avoid iterator creation. Thanks to Mario at badlogicgames for assistance.

Updated for 1.0.1 release

Load sound resources asynchronously at startup, partial workaround for https://code.google.com/p/android-developer-preview/issues/detail?id=1812 . On affected devices the sounds can take around 15 seconds to load.
